title: LMS-Integrated Simulation-Based Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A social sector job training course using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric LMS environment. Operates as an employment-linked program.

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 85% of four or more social field simulation scenarios via the LMS.
Learners can demonstrate team project execution capabilities through peer and self-evaluation in VR-based collaborative activities.
Learners can substantiate three or more job-related competencies using the portfolio system within the LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
